data.actual_result: The icon appears for a split second then disappears
data.expected_result: I'd assume that the icon should appear when the game is not compatible with the overlay but shouldn't appear if it works fine
data.short_description: While hovering the cursor over the added games in "user settings">"games" the overlay warning icon appears for a split second and then disappears.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to User Settings>Games - Hover over the added games (as shown in the Video)
